Venue Information

Parking: Valet parking available

Transport: Shuttle service from hotels at 3:30 PM

Directions: Nearest metro station - Wedding Plaza

Grand Ballroom

456 Celebration Avenue, New Delhi

Temple Gardens

789 Sacred Lane, New Delhi

Parking: Limited street parking

Transport: Shuttle service from hotels at 9:00 AM

Directions: Enter through the main temple gate

Grand Ballroom

456 Celebration Avenue, New Delhi

Parking: Underground parking available

Transport: Complimentary shuttle from hotels

Wedding Rituals

A brief guide to the sacred ceremonies you'll witness

9:00 AM

Ganesh Puja

Invocation of Lord Ganesha to remove obstacles and bless the union

9:30 AM

Kanyadaan

Father giving away his daughter, symbolizing trust and respect

10:00 AM

Panigrahana

Groom holds bride's hand, signifying their union

10:30 AM

Saptapadi

Seven vows around the sacred fire, each representing a promise

11:30 AM

Sindoor Daan

Groom applies sindoor to bride's hair parting, marking her as married

Dietary Information

All meals served during the wedding will be pure vegetarian with no onion or garlic.

We can accommodate special dietary requirements including vegan, gluten-free, and nut allergies. Please specify during RSVP.

Note: Meals will be served during the Sangeet (dinner) and Reception events.

Livestream Access

Unable to join us in person? Watch the ceremony live!

Live Stream Link: Watch Ceremony Live

Please note the time zone: IST (UTC+5:30)

The livestream will begin 15 minutes before the ceremony and include audio commentary to explain rituals.

Frequently Asked Questions

For the wedding ceremonies, we recommend traditional Indian attire. For the reception, cocktail or party wear is appropriate. Please check the specific dress code for each event in the Events section.

Please check your invitation for the number of guests included. If you have questions about bringing additional guests, please contact us directly.

We understand that not everyone can join us in person. We will be offering a livestream option for the main wedding ceremony. Details can be found in the Livestream section.

Children are welcome at most of our events. Please indicate the ages of any children attending when you RSVP so we can make appropriate arrangements.

All meals served during the wedding will be pure vegetarian with no onion or garlic. We can accommodate special dietary requirements including vegan, gluten-free, and nut allergies. Please specify your needs during RSVP.

We have arranged special rates at several hotels near the wedding venues. Please contact us for a list of recommended accommodations.

You can RSVP for each event using the buttons on the event cards in the Events section. Alternatively, you can contact us directly at info@priyawedsraj.com or call +91 98765 43210.

Still have questions?

With joy and gratitude,

Priya & Raj
